description:
Wiene has been separated from Bell and the others, left in the care of Lyd and the other Xenos. At the same time, the Xenos have divided into several groups in order to move to a different hidden village. The arachne Ranieh`s group accompanies Wiene in the move, but they fall into an evil plot spearheaded by Dix, of the Ikelos Familia. One after another, they are slaughtered, and then the hands of evil reach for Wiene...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 惨劇の王者[イケロス・ファミリア]
